表格部门表的代码预览

drop index department_PK on department;

drop table if exists department;

/*==============================================================*/
/* Table: department */
/*==============================================================*/
create table department
(
departmentid int not null,
depnames varchar(50),
primary key (departmentid)
);

/*==============================================================*/
/* Index: department_PK */
/*==============================================================*/
create unique index department_PK on department
(
departmentid
);
